column1: Tark is an Orkish word that was often used by the Orcs of the later Third Age to describe a Men of Númenóreans heritage (such as the Gondorians). Considering the enmity between the Orcs and the Men of Gondor
column2: the word tark tended to be used in an insulting way.
a Westron borrowing from Quenya that literally meant "High Man".
but "possibly a mere abbreviation of tarkil".
